lexUnit.name: wrap.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a loose outer garment or piece of material. [Clothing]

sentence.text: Her wrap had fallen right off .
But she replied only with a slight inclination , and then turned for Conchis to take off her wrap , which he placed over the back of his own chair .
He stood up , disappeared to fetch her cotton wrap from her bedroom .
When we first saw Mark Cottrell 's fabric wraps around his handles/lines we wondered why no-one else had ever thought of the same idea .
A tall woman in a loose blue calico wrap , her ankles and wrists glinting with gold in the sun , squatted on the dusty ground .
A soft cotton wrap gives a relaxed look to a smart tailored trouser suit .
Wearing a chic black costume and white fur wrap , she is seen waving to him as he departs for the colony before walking away to a smart car beside which stands a chauffeur .
I hesitated , then went back for the indigo wrap .
She looked round quickly , yelped and leaped off the table , grabbing a wrap that lay over the arm of a chair .
She grabbed the wrap and hugged it round her , agonisingly aware of the swollen-eyed wreck she must look in the brightness .
Fiona returned , pulling on a fluffy white wrap over her red silk dress , saying she really did n't want to go to the dinner and being persuaded again by her husband .
The girl pulled on her wrap and moved to the door looking back over her shoulder as she went and Paula was aware of the hostility in her gaze .
She sat on the sofa still , pulling the folds of the silk wrap over her bare belly , her thighs .
Pausing only to pull on the lightweight wrap that lay across the foot of the bunk , she grasped the torch more firmly and peered cautiously around the curtain .
He scrutinised her perfect features , his all-assessing gaze moving to her shape , clearly outlined as she pulled the folds of her cotton wrap closer to her .
He helped put the wrap over her shoulders and she was silent on the short drive home .
While he was in the dressing-room , she took it off , placing her silk wrap round her shoulders .
